messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Need someone to volunteer to do mining, willl reward them handsomely. Call out if you want mining access to mine

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Security Alert

Gr3y.T1d3 virus detected in Space Station 13 door subroutines. Severity level of 1. Recommend station AI involvement.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Space Station 13, please stand-by.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Radical, Braaaah, Now, ALL OF THE SURVIVORS, THIS IS BIG CUNTONI, MY FRIENDS CALL ME BIG CUNT, PLEASE, COME TO BRIDGE AND HELP US CALL AN ESCAPE SHUTTLE AND AN ESCAPE SHUTTLE TEAM

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Zombies, if you can read this, i'm going to kill you all.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: You know what would be a dick move? If I recalled the shuttle, But I won't. Also, Evac Team, Hurry your fuckign ass up.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Attention survivors, the rescue team is being dispatched with the shuttle.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

High levels of radiation detected near the station. Maintenance is best shielded from radiation.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

The radiation threat has passed. Please return to your workplaces.
